title: Jeff Kosseff: "The Twenty-Six Words That Created the Internet"
description: Michael speaks with US Naval Academy Professor Jeff Kosseff, about his nonfiction narrative history of Section 230 of the Communications Decency Act, titled "The Twenty-Six Words That Created the Internet." Original air date 29 May 2020. The book was published on 15 April 2019.
author: podcasts@siriusxm.com (Michael Smerconish, Jeff Kosseff)
